评论概述: Great as non-medical work shirts, too!
评论详情: While I don’t work in the medical field, I absolutely love these scrubs! They pass as normal work shirts and are very comfortable to wear. 评论概述: Depends on your patient population whether this top is for you
评论详情: It’s super comfortable although I should note that I did buy a size down thanks to other reviews. Otherwise it would have been too big. I will say, however, that I look more like a mechanic than a nurse. Also, the pockets aren’t nearly as roomy as normal scrub tops and they’re slanted rather than square so forget about carrying the usual things nurses need in their pockets while in a hospital setting. The biggest advantage to the top is that patients don’t get to stare at your cleavage while you’re delivering care, so if your patients are anything like mine, you won’t mind foregoing the above mentioned conveniences if it means not dealing with handsy, inappropriate patients (especially if you’ve got a lot of patients with mental health issues, are on hard illegal drugs or just tend to be more aggressive)
Great fit. Great price. Very stylish.
Arrived in a timely manner- was  as described and fit well. Very comfortable as well.

Looks really great when you get it, I love the fact that it had pockets. But the first time I washed it it came out pilly and had fuzz stuck all over it. I wash everything and cold, but I did try it on medium which apparently you need to tumble dry low. I generally don't like trying my stuff for 6 hours so medium is what I usually use. I don't know what other people do maybe everybody else drives their stuff on low. So if you're somebody who drives your stuff on low it's probably perfect for you. Although who knows it may still come out pilly and full of fuzz.

This is a great shirt for a retail worker not just medical! It does not look like a scrub!  In total I have ordered 4.
I would definitely buy this again. Best work shirt I have ever purchased.
